sentences.sentence: Assignments in early quartos and First Folio texts will use Internet texts and facsimiles.
sentences.translation: 早期的四开本和首页对折文章的作业将使用因特网正文和传真。

sentences.sentence: Scholars who work on publishing many of the plays make careful choices about whether to use words from the First Folio, or the Quartos.
sentences.translation: 研究出版剧本工作的学者们精挑细选，看是使用首批对开本，还是四开本。
